Name: Ruins
Desc: Small ruins. Grant Wood x300 and Iron x300 after being cleaned up. The area will then be restored to a vacant area.

Name: Ruins
Desc: Medium ruins. Grant Wood x600 and Iron x600 after being cleaned up. The area will then be restored to a vacant area.

Name: Ruins
Desc: Big ruins. Grant Wood x1000 and Iron x1000 after being cleaned up. The area will then be restored to a vacant area.

Name: Residence
Desc: It provides a place to stay for a certain number of people. This way they will be less prone to disease and starvation. At least, it's better than letting them sleep on the ground.

Name: Medical Depot
Desc: With enough residents working in it, the Medical Depot will produce a fixed amount of Medicine every day.

Name: Supply Depot
Desc: With enough residents working in it, the Supply Depot will produce a fixed amount of Food every day.

Name: Outpost
Desc: Constructing outpost(s) unlocks the [Explore] feature. There are supplies and survivors beyond the camp. Form a team to explore the world outside. (Cannot be demolished)

Name: Comms Device
Desc: There must be more survivors on this land. Let's keep broadcasting. Someone will be able to hear us... right?

Name: Old Medical Depot
Desc: With enough residents working in it, the Big Medical Depot will produce a fixed amount of Medicine every day.

Name: Old Supply Depot
Desc: With enough residents working in it, the Big Supply Depot will produce a fixed amount of Food every day.

Name: Small Ruins
Desc: Small ruins. After clearing them, you will get <color=#0F70BC>Wood x100</color> and <color=#0F70BC>Iron x100</color> and the area will be <color=#0F70BC>restored to a vacant area</color>.

Name: Medium Ruins
Desc: Medium ruins. After clearing them, you will get <color=#0F70BC>Wood x200</color> and <color=#0F70BC>Iron x200</color> and the area will be <color=#0F70BC>restored to a vacant area</color>.

Name: Big Ruins
Desc: Big ruins. After clearing them, you will get <color=#0F70BC>Wood x500</color> and <color=#0F70BC>Iron x500</color> and the area will be <color=#0F70BC>restored to a vacant area</color>.

Name: Residence
Desc: It provides a place to live for some people <color=#0F70BC>(10 people)</color>. At least, it's more comfortable than passing the night on the ground. Those in it are less likely to get tired. <color=#0F70BC>(They lose less Spirit.)</color>

Name: Medical Depot
Desc: With enough residents working in it, the Medical Depot will produce a fixed amount of Medicine every day.

Name: Supply Depot
Desc: With enough residents working in it, the Supply Depot will produce a fixed amount of Food every day.

Name: Outpost
Desc: Constructing outpost(s) unlocks the <color=#0F70BC>Explore</color> feature. There are supplies and survivors beyond the camp. Form a team to explore the world outside. <color=#FF0033>(Cannot be demolished)</color>

Name: Comms Device
Desc: A communication device with the radar feature. It can scan nearby terrain and establish communication with the outside world. <color=#FF0033>(Cannot be demolished)</color>

Name: Outpost
Desc: After constructing an outpost, you will be able to form a team to explore the world. <color=#FF0033>(Cannot be demolished)</color>

Name: Outpost
Desc: Constructing outpost(s) unlocks the <color=#0F70BC>Explore</color> feature. There are supplies and survivors beyond the camp. Form a team to explore the world outside. <color=#FF0033>(Cannot be demolished)</color>

Name: Outpost
Desc: Constructing outpost(s) unlocks the [Explore] feature. There are supplies and survivors beyond the camp. Form a team to explore the world outside. (Cannot be demolished)

Name: Comms Device
Desc: A communication device with the recording feature. Can be used for recording or communicating with distant locations.

Name: Not-So-Small Ruins
Desc: Relatively small ruins. After clearing them, you will get <color=#0F70BC>Wood x200</color> and <color=#0F70BC>Iron x200</color> and the area will be <color=#0F70BC>restored to a vacant area</color>.

Name: Not-So-Big Ruins
Desc: Relatively big ruins. After clearing them, you will get <color=#0F70BC>Wood x350</color> and <color=#0F70BC>Iron x350</color> and the area will be <color=#0F70BC>restored to a vacant area</color>.

Name: Shelter
Desc: It provides a place to live for some people <color=#0F70BC>(5 people)</color>. At least, it's more comfortable than passing the night on the ground. Those in it are less likely to get tired. <color=#0F70BC>(They lose less Spirit.)</color>
